title: Facebook Ads Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Facebook Ads platform for lead generation and advertising campaigns

specs.title: Create Facebook Ads connection with valid OAuth credentials
specs.given: valid Facebook Ads OAuth client ID and secret from Facebook Ads developer console
specs.when: user creates a new Facebook Ads connection
specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

specs.title: Reject Facebook Ads connection with invalid credentials
specs.when: user attempts to create Facebook Ads connection
specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

specs.title: Update Facebook Ads connection name
specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
